summary: Employee Performance Appraisal web app where name-based sign-in (e.g., Jayesh Deshmukh) should open the employee profile populated with employee details, performance appraisal data, and onboarding questionnaire. Current issues include blank/empty profile after Continue and onboarding stuck on loading/slow.
architectural_notes: Name-based sign-in should route to an employee profile lookup by name (e.g., 'Jayesh Deshmukh') and render seeded employee + performance + onboarding data; avoid blank state.
Onboarding questionnaire should be stored/served as a bounded list (10–15 questions) and must not hang on loading.
known_issues: Clicking 'Continue' on the name-based sign-in screen results in a blank screen/empty profile instead of loading the employee profile.
Jayesh Deshmukh (EMP1024) employee data/performance data not showing on the profile (empty profile page).
Onboarding questions are stuck on loading / very slow to open and show nothing.

existing_features.title: Store and display the provided external Employee ID "EMP1024" as part of the employee profile data model, and ensure it is included in the seeded Jayesh Deshmukh employee record.
Seed the provided performance appraisal details for Jayesh Deshmukh (appraisal period April 2025 – March 2026) into the backend and ensure the Appraisal UI can load and display it for Jayesh.

Replace the backend onboarding questionnaire questions with the exact provided list (10–15 questions; use the full provided list of 15), and ensure the onboarding questionnaire screen loads reliably without getting stuck on loading for non-admin users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Pre-seed/create employee profile for Jayesh Deshmukh (EMP1024) with HR/HR Executive details and display it after name-based sign-in.
Add Jayesh Deshmukh performance appraisal data (Apr 2025–Mar 2026) including 85% rating/Grade A, increment details, criteria, and feedback; show on profile.
Add onboarding questionnaire (10–15 sample questions provided) to employee profile and ensure it loads reliably.
Fix 'Continue' on name-based sign-in causing blank screen/empty profile page; should navigate directly to the employee profile for the entered name.
Fix onboarding section performance/reliability: currently stuck on loading and/or takes too long to open; ensure timely load.

Add backend seed logic to guarantee that an employee profile for "Jayesh Deshmukh" exists and can be auto-resolved after sign-in, so that logging in with the access-gate name "Jayesh Deshmukh" no longer results in an empty profile page.

projectName: Seed Jayesh Deshmukh employee + appraisal data and fix onboarding questionnaire loading
